about_the_game:
Embark on an extraordinary journey in the enchanting world of Everdell!
Glimmergold introduces three new ways to play that you can mix-and-match to your perfect fit:

Extra! Extra!

The carnival has come to Everdell, and we’re spreading the news! Test your wits and entertain your citizens with new cards to bring your city to life:


Legends

Your reputation has spread, and notable characters from around the woodland are popping by for a visit! Legendary critters and constructions are powerful new cards that can super-charge your city!

  • At the start of each game, a Legendary Critter and Legendary Construction is added to your starting hand…and they don’t count against how many cards you can hold!
  • You can play a Legendary card by paying its resource cost, or replace the proper card from your city to play it for free!
  • Each Legendary card opens up an extra slot in your city for even more epic possibilities!

Rugwort

Hide your valuables! The mischievous Rugwort has arrived with three new cards that will allow you to interfere with your opponents plans like never before!

…and Rugwort has brought friends! Rugworts Minions are a new style of worker that you can send scurrying off to help your city grow!

New Achievements and Challenges!

Prove your mastery of Everdell and push your ability to govern your city! Whether you're a seasoned player or just starting out, three new Glimmergold Challenges and five Achievements give you lots to discover!

A new season is dawning in Everdell – write your own tale of woodland glory when Glimmergold arrives this month!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 13
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8600M GT (256 MB) or ATI Radeon HD 2600 Pro (256 MB)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OSX 13
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 650M (1 GB) or ATI Radeon HD 5670 (512 MB) or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

name: Everdell - Glimmergold

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit version only)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2400 or AMD Ryzen 3 2200G
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 2000 graphics or Vega 8 graphics
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8800 GT (512 MB) or ATI Radeon HD 4850 (512 MB) or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
